review_data.content: Well worth a visit and the food and drinks are resonable priced. The staff are attentive and very friendly

review_data.title: Unfriendly Bar Service

review_data.title: Nette Bar
review_data.content: in der nähe vom HB Zürich. Leider ist das Personal etwas unfreundlich und es ist alles auf Selbstbedienungsbasis. Meiner Meinung...More

review_data.title: Let's give it a chance
review_data.content: At around lunch time most Zurich's cafes, restaurants, bistros are crowded and it is hard to find a place. Although perfectly positioned just the first lateral street on Bahnhofstrasse right after the Railway Station, Oscar Kowalski was almost empty. This attracted us but aroused some...More

review_data.title: perfect service from a beautiful young lady
review_data.content: Perfect service from a beautiful young lady. I can recommend the bar to anyone who wants to eat out at a decent place served by excellent waitress.

review_data.title: Einer der schlechtesten Bars in Zürich
review_data.content: Unfreundliches Personal, das bei jeder Gelegenheit die Augen verdreht, schlechtes Essen und vermutlich die dreckigste Toilette, die ich in Zürich...More

review_data.title: Bar in Bahnhofsnähe
review_data.content: Für ein Getränk in Bahnhofsnähe eignet sich das Oskar Kowalski allemal. Sie führen Bier aus Uster, was zwar sehr synpathisch...More

review_data.title: Chillax away from Bahnhoffstraße
review_data.content: Just off Bahnhoffstraße, I discovered this place last August. Wifi which is rare in Züri! Quiet with friendly service just steps away from the throngs on Bhfstraße. Outdoor seating aswell as an outdoor atrium within the bar

review_data.title: Breakfeast was good
review_data.content: The hotels breackfeast place. It's a small buffet breackfeast and it was very good. Lots og interesting things but like everything else the prices are a bit high. 21CHF even with the hotel 'discount'

review_data.title: Convenient bar off Bahnhofstrasse
review_data.content: We dashed into this bar, right of Bahnhofstrasse to escape the pouring rain... and entered this pleasant place. Good atmosphere, pleasant lighting with music played at a volume that allows a conversation. (At least it did at 6 pm). They have cocktails and mocktails and...More

review_data.title: Nice enough, nothing special.
review_data.content: We came here for a few coffees and a light bite. The coffee was average and the food of a similar standard. The toilets could also use a refurb. Otherwise the ambiance was good and location great.

review_data.title: Mehr Bar als Restaurant

review_data.title: ruhiges aber eher dunkles Restaurant

review_data.title: Decent wine bar
review_data.content: We had our afterwork team apéro at Oskar Kowalski and also tasted their tapas. The tapas are priced at 5 CHF which I find quite good value. They have a good selection of wines and outside seating in the yard. It is 2 mins walk...More

review_data.title: Early tapas lunch was just what we needed.
review_data.content: After landing in Zurich early that morning from Sydney, and our body clocks still not in sync with local time, the waitress accommodated our request for early tapas lunch. We tried the prawns, chorizo, olives and feta and they hit the spot. I complicated my...More

review_data.title: Gute Lage und Chance verpasst
review_data.content: Nach einem guten Mittagessen mit einem Freund waren wir Richtung HB Zürich unterwegs. Die Bar's an der Schützengasse waren gut...More

review_data.title: Afterwork Apéro
review_data.content: Super feine Tapas. Gemütlich und gut eingerichtet trotz engen Platzverhältnissen. Geeignet für ein Date - wo man sich näher kommt...More

review_data.title: Gutes Ambiente
review_data.content: Gut und günstig. Klasse Musik. Der Cappuccino ist einer der besten die ich getrunken habe. Ist etwas laut

review_data.title: Modern und preiswert
review_data.content: Zentrales Café in der Nähe vom Hauptbahnhof. Abwechslungsreiche Speisekarte, auch Tapas werden angeboten. Zu empfehlen als Pausenort für Züri.

review_data.title: Unaufmerksam
review_data.content: Zu laute Musik, nicht sehr originelle Karte, für eine Bar zu viele Paare mit Kinderwagen, Bedienung nicht sehr aufmerksam

review_data.title: Large café with sidewalk and garden seating off Bahnhofstrasse
review_data.content: Oskar Kowalski is located off the side of Bahnhofstrasse and seems to be a sister/partner restaurant of D-Vino Weinbars, based on the receipt. They have sidewalk tables, but these are mostly on the shady (non-sun) side of the business. Inside there is a variety of...More
